author: smartini
msg: PIVOT-956, first changes to add the skin (optional) ability to disable Transitions.
Add a first Demo working (RowEditorDemo); for documentation purposes, set this is variants (under tests) of the skin default and dark config files.

author: markt
msg: Ensure that client IO threads are stopped if a secure WebSocket client connection fails.

author: rhuijben
msg: In mod_dav_svn: Properly forward post lock and post unlock failures that are
wrapped with different errors like SVN_ERR_REPOS_POST_LOCK_HOOK_FAILED,
instead of just reporting a generic message.
svn: E165008: Locking succeeded, but post-lock hook failed
svn: E165008: Failed to create new lock.
which more accurately describes the result.
refresh_locks): Check for hook as error cause instead of only as
